title: lendxcoin
author: lendxcoin
content: Cryptodragonball is a NFTs game. We are proud that this is the first NFTs game on the Binance Smart Chain platform based on the popular manga series. - Dragon Ball.After a period of game development. Up to now the game has been put into operation. In the first time we will open and let members join the game to play completely free to receive DRB tokens. The DRB token has been listed on Pancakeswap with the DRB/BNB trading pair.To join the CryptoDragonBall game, go to the following link:: https://play.cryptodragonball.io/Game Instructions: https://tutorial.cryptodragonball.io/  /   https://www.youtube.com/@CryptoDragonBall_GlobalContract: https://bscscan.com/address/0xB071Bd5b22f33B40a8324152bdb3c5D02a2f2f49Social  LinkWebsite: https://cryptodragonball.ioWhite Paper: https://cryptodragonball.io/whitepapers/CRYPTODRAGONBALL.pdfDocument: https://docs.cryptodragonball.io/Telegram channel: https://t.me/cryptodragonballTelegram group (Asia): https://t.me/Crypto_DRBTelegram group (Global): https://t.me/CryptoDRB_GlobalTwitter: https://twitter.com/Crypto_DRFacebook: https://facebook.com/CryptoDRBTiktok: http://www.tiktok.com/@crypto_dragonballYoutube: https://www.youtube.com/@CryptoDragonBall_GlobalBeta game: https://beta.cryptodragonball.io/
